case_title: KHANI ZAMAN vs AZAD GOVERNMENT Through Chief Secretary, Azad Jammu And Kashmir, Muzaffarabad And 3 Others
court_name: Azad Jammu and Kashmir Service Tribunal
respondent: Azad Government Through Chief Secretary, Azad Jammu And Kashmir, Muzaffarabad And 3 Others
legal_issues: Seniority determination under Azad Jammu and Kashmir Civil Servants Act, 1976 and related rules.
Failure of respondents to challenge appellant's promotion orders within the statutory time frame.
Competency of Chief Secretary to review his own order.

appellant: Promotion and confirmation dates establish seniority over respondents.
Respondents failed to challenge promotions within statutory limits.
Final seniority list excluded respondents' names and was not objected to.
respondents: Appellant's promotion order was made without notice to respondents.
Respondents were senior based on earlier grade entry dates.

decision.directions: Restore appellant's seniority position as originally assigned in seniority list issued on 1990-01-25.
